TF026804-PHRD-ARMENIA: HEALTH SYSTEM
            OPTIMIZATION PROJECT,TF030603-AUSTRIA GENERAL CTF FY05 - ECA,TF053436-PHRD-ARMENIA: HEALTH SYSTEMS
            MODERNIZATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Health System
            Modernization Project for Armenia is to improve the
            organization of the health care system in order to provide
            more accessible, quality and sustainable health care
            services to the population, in particular to the most
            vulnerable groups; and better manage public health threats.
            The reallocation is necessary to support the ongoing project
            activities which were revised in 2008-2009 as well as to
            fulfill contract obligations signed through tenders. In
            2006, agreement was reached between the Government and the
            Bank to include in the project the renovation of Ijevan and
            Hrazdan Medical centers; and to carry out the renovation,
            two civil works contracts totaling US$2,577,500 were signed.
            The second health system performance assessment and the 2008
            national health accounts reports have been published.
            However, no further progress has been observed in the
            implementation of activities on improving governance
            arrangements of public hospitals. Similarly, no progress has
            been made in the independent audit of hospitals in 2009, as
            the allocation of funds to the public hospitals to conduct
            audit was not considered by the Government due to lack of
            state budget in view of the economic crisis. The Government
            has now planned to allocate resources for hospital
            independent audit in the 2011 health budget with the
            expectations that the state budget will come out from the
            effect of deep recession. The project will close on June 30,
            2010. The next mission is planned for May 2010. The
            implementation completion report (ICR) will be prepared in
            September 2010.
